'''Alola''' is the seventh [[Regions|Region]] in the Pokéclicker world, where the player starts the game. The Pokédex for this region contains 151 Pokémon from Bulbasaur to Mew. Uniquely to this region, certain Pokémon can only be found in the [[Safari Zone]].
